com.nitnelave.CreeperHeal.utils
Class CreeperLog

java.lang.Object
  com.nitnelave.CreeperHeal.utils.CreeperLog

public abstract class CreeperLog
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used for all the outputting to the console and to players.

Author:
nitnelave

public static void warning(java.lang.String message)

logInfo

public static void logInfo(java.lang.String msg,
                           int level)
Display an information message to the console, if the verbosity is high enough, i.e. if level is lower or equals to the log level.

Parameters:
msg - The message to be logged.
level - The corresponding verbosity of the message.

severe

public static void severe(java.lang.String message)
Output a SEVERE message to the console and record it.

Parameters:
message - The message to be output.

debug

public static void debug(java.lang.String message)
Output a debug message, if the debug setting is true.

Parameters:
message - The message to output.

displayBlockLocation

public static void displayBlockLocation(org.bukkit.block.Block block,
                                        boolean force)
Display the type and the location of a block in a formatted way. If force is true, then it is a warning (as part of a warning message). Otherwise it is a debug message.

Parameters:
block - The block whose information is displayed.
force - Whether it is a warning or a debug message.
